description: The `v-divider` component is used to separate sections of lists or layouts.

props.contentOffset: Increases content spacing from the lines. When passed as an array, the second value shifts slot content down (or right in vertical mode).
props.gradient: Adds fading effect for both sides.
props.inset: Adds indentation (72px) for **normal** dividers, reduces max height for **vertical**.
props.length: Sets the dividers length. Default unit is px.
props.thickness: Sets the dividers thickness. Default unit is px.
